knimeNode.name: OPS_search_freetext
knimeNode.shortDescription: Returns a set of concept URLs associated to the input free text. Driven by ConceptWiki.

fullDescription.option: Limits the number of results; optional. Minimum value is 1, maximum value is common sense. Default value is 10.
The search results will be filtered by this source authority; optional. Possible values: 1 = Community, 2 = UMLS, 3 = SwissProt, 4 = ChemSpider, 5 = ConceptWiki
